item.title: Error with packet?
item.dc:creator: @irlegitir irlegitir
item.description:
@irlegitir wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Title", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::barrage - 1k barrage runes.", 8148); sendQuest("::master - 99 all stats.", 8149); sendQuest("::dh - dharok set, firecape, barrows gloves.", 8150); sendQuest("Shops in edge store.", 8151); sendQuest("Portals behind edge bank - read signs!", 8152); sendQuest("Earn money by killing monsters.", 8153); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } When I change “rules” to “help” or “commands” and compile it works. But when I type it in-game it gives a error something like “packet failure” and disconnects+reconnects me, anyone know the problem? Thanks.

Read full topic
